name: @berhot/platform
description: Berhot - Multi-tenant SaaS platform for POS, Loyalty, Workforce, and Business Management
author: Berhot <engineering@berhot.com>

scripts.dev:backend: npx concurrently -n ia,pos,email -c blue,green,magenta "cd platform/identity-access && go run ./cmd/server" "cd platform/pos-engine && go run ./cmd/server" "pnpm --filter @berhot/email-service dev"
scripts.preview: turbo run build && turbo run preview --parallel --concurrency 20
scripts.preview:commerce: turbo run build --filter='./products/commerce/**' && turbo run preview --filter='./products/commerce/**' --parallel
scripts.preview:experience: turbo run build --filter='./products/experience/**' && turbo run preview --filter='./products/experience/**' --parallel
scripts.preview:engagement: turbo run build --filter='./products/engagement/**' && turbo run preview --filter='./products/engagement/**' --parallel
scripts.preview:workforce: turbo run build --filter='./products/workforce/**' && turbo run preview --filter='./products/workforce/**' --parallel
scripts.preview:restaurant: turbo run build --filter=@berhot/restaurant-pos-app && turbo run preview --filter=@berhot/restaurant-pos-app
scripts.preview:cafe: turbo run build --filter=@berhot/cafe-pos-app && turbo run preview --filter=@berhot/cafe-pos-app
scripts.preview:retail: turbo run build --filter=@berhot/retail-pos-app && turbo run preview --filter=@berhot/retail-pos-app
scripts.preview:marketing: turbo run build --filter=@berhot/marketing-website && turbo run preview --filter=@berhot/marketing-website
scripts.preview:landing: turbo run build --filter=@berhot/landing-app && turbo run preview --filter=@berhot/landing-app
